description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 24th November 2023 (RN 23/06222/FULL) (which itself varied earlier permissions dated  for: Reconfiguration of two residential units to form one unit within Nos. 25, 26 and 48; and new residential unit within No. 49; installation of four condenser units, two on each of the roofs of Nos. 25 and 26; and extension at rear third and fourth floor level of No. 25 and associated works (site includes 25-26 Chester Square and 49-48 Eaton Mews South). NAMELY, amendments to approved drawings to allow alterations to rear elevation including to fenestration and soil pipes.
